actions.text: Amendment SA 2634 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2634 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 343.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2634.

Amendment SA 2634 proposed by Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S13130-13131; text: CR S13130) To provide an additional $500,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2006 through 2010, to be used for readjustment counseling, related mental health services, and treatment and rehabilitative services for veterans with mental illness, post-traumatic stress disorder, or substance use disorder.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2634 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 55. Record Vote Number: 343.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2634 proposed by Senator Boxer.

purpose: To provide an additional $500,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2006 through 2010, to be used for readjustment counseling, related mental health services, and treatment and rehabilitative services for veterans with mental illness, post-traumatic stress disorder, or substance use disorder.
